memories.title: RAF Service (1940s)
memories.description: Maintained Lancaster bombers and whistled "We’ll Meet Again" while working. Speaks proudly of fixing a jammed undercarriage during an air raid.

memories.title: Woodwork Teaching at Sheffield College
memories.description: Recalls the scent of pine, carving dovetail joints with students, and receiving a hand-chiselled plaque from a student.

memories.title: Sunday Roast Tradition
memories.description: Carving lamb, preparing Yorkshire pudding, and hearing granddaughter ring the church bell before dinner.
